topic: Nottinghamshire wins 2025 County Cricket Championship after intense battle with Surrey.
evaluation: This cluster provides an exceptionally strong and continuous narrative detailing Nottinghamshire's path to winning the 2025 County Cricket Championship. The articles chronologically cover the final stages of the season, from the lead-up to the crucial four-day match against Surrey (the direct title contenders), through its dramatic progression day-by-day, to Nottinghamshire's victory in that match, and their eventual crowning as champions in the final round. All articles contribute directly to this central storyline, offering developmental details on team standings, key player performances, and match outcomes. No articles were deemed noisy or irrelevant as every piece adds context and progression to the championship race, making de-noising unnecessary.
